nodes.text: Down And Out On Coruscant is a vignette written by Michael Allen Horne for the Dark Empire Sourcebook in 1993.

Generals Lando Calrissian and Wedge Antilles lead the Star Destroyer Liberator to Coruscant after seeing an opportunity to strike at Imperial City during the Imperial infighting in 10 ABY. After dropping out of hyperspace above the planet, they come under attack by Imperial forces. Luke Skywalker is able to safely land the damaged Liberator on the surface of Coruscant, but the group is forced to defend themselves against Imperial ground forces for five days until Han Solo and Leia Organa Solo arrive to rescue them.
